#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define lld long long int
lld find(lld n)
{
	lld count=0;
	while(n>1)
	{
		count = count+n/2;
		if(n&1)
		n = n/2+1;
		else
		n/=2;
	}
	return count;
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	lld n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		printf("%lld\n",find(n));
	}
	return 0;
}
